intro: Psychotria nigotei, commonly known as black psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and small, tubular flowers that are typically greenish-white in color. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in dense rainforest undergrowth. Due to its ornamental value and ecological importance, it is sometimes cultivated in botanical gardens.
